description: Replaces values in source column with some, or all matches of a text/pattern being replaced by a new text/pattern. The pattern can be a text or a regular expression. If the pattern is a text, only the first occurrence will be replaced. Replacement values are added to 'replace' column.

input.name: find column
input.description: The name of the column in data to be searched.

input.name: find pattern
input.description: A text or a regular expression to be replaced. Regular expressions must be wrapped with `/` character (e.g. `/.*/`).

input.name: replace column
input.description: The name of the column in data to contain replaced values.

input.name: replace pattern
input.description: A text or a regular expression to replace the 'find pattern'. Regular expressions must be wrapped with `/` character (e.g. `/.*/`).

input.name: replacement
input.description: A text that replaces the substring specified by the `pattern` parameter.
